import './App.css'; import React, {useState} from 'react'; function App() { const [query, setQuery] = useState(''); const [weather, setWeather] = useState({}); const search = evt => { if (evt.key === "Enter") { fetch(`${api.base}weather?q=${query}&units=metric&APPID=${api.key}`) .then(es => es.json()) .then(esult => { setWeather(esult); setQuery(''); console.log(esult); }); } } return ( <>
12:30 PM
Monday, 25 May
setQuery(e.target.value)} value={query} onKeyPress={search} />
Asia/Kolkata
IN
Monday
Night - 25.6° C
Day - 35.6° C
Tue
Night - 25.6° C
Day - 35.6° C

Night - 25.6° C
Day - 35.6° C
Thur
Night - 25.6° C
Day - 35.6° C
Fri
Night - 25.6° C
Day - 35.6° C
Sat
Night - .6° C
Day - 35.6° C
); } export default App;
